content.p: University is about more than just studying! It's also about developing as a person - building skills and relationships, learning to get your voice heard and creating positive change. Here are some of the ways the Faculty of Arts helps and supports you to get involved and thrive. There's always someone to talk to A place to fit in and belong Improve things for the better Placements and work experience The ESE team are dedicated to supporting students to get their voice heard, feel part of the student community, promote development opportunities and support you in your studies. Current students: if youâ€™d like to talk to us about any activities or projects contact your local team. For course and admissions enquiries see our enquiry page For Faculty contacts see our contacts page
